feed.title: SAP Community - David Ruiz Badia
feed.subtitle: David Ruiz Badia in SAP Community

entry.title: SAP Inside Track Barcelona 2023 + SAP Community "Watch-and-code" party - Nov 2nd-3rd, 2023
entry.content:
Hi Barcelona!!

We are very excited to announce to you that SAP Inside Track Barcelona 7th edition will take place next November 2nd and 3rd 2023.

NEW!!!  This year we will also host "SAP Community "watch-and-code" party, which will take place in the morning of November 3rd . 

A SAP Inside Track (SIT) is a local grassroots community organised event where SAP Community Network members come together to share knowledge and expertise and to network about SAP related topics. SAP Inside Tracks have been very successful in countries all over the World.

Come to learn and share your knowledge with your peers as well as make new friends in an informal atmosphere.

SAP Inside Track events offer Community provided sessions from SAP Experts and passionate SCN members.

We invite you to participate and help us to do a great event.  Don’t forget to invite your colleagues.

When

SAP Inside Track event will take place in Barcelona next November 2nd and 3rd,  2023.

Where (NEW)

Thursday Nov 2nd - OFICINAS SYNTAX, (c/Lluçanès 38, 08022 Barcelona)

https://goo.gl/maps/N9iboXDmb6LyAttv9

Friday Nov 3rd -  Enel/Endesa  HQ Barcelona, Modernist Room (Carrer de Roger de Flor 48, 08018 Barcelona)

https://goo.gl/maps/Kp25w8mZgLo

 

 Meeting provided by

 

Who

For local and global SAP community (customers, consultants, freelancers, startups, press and bloggers, SAP employees) plus for those totally new to SAP. The most important is that you want to share and gain some knowledge and new buddies.

Registration

https://www.eventbrite.es/e/sap-inside-track-barcelona-incl-sap-community-watch-and-code-party-2023-tickets-693987444127

Sessions and Agenda (NEW)

This year 2023, agenda (*) will have next schema

1- Thursday Nov 2nd, afternoon, SITBarcelona Opening and Welcome.  and sessions (Block 1).

2- Afterwards, altogether dinner (TBC).

3- Friday Nov 3rd,

  • SAP Community "watch-and-code" party
    • Welcome and introduction to SAP Community "Watch-and-Code" Party
    • Keynote (full) or Keynote Highlight (30 min) + Expert Q&A Session
    • Break/beverages & snacks
    • Mini Code JAM: Extending SAP S/4HANA via SAP BTP (CAP & RAP)
    • Lunch
    • Engagement Activity & Closing SAP Community Watch & Code Party
  • SITBarcelona sessions (Block 2)
  • Closing SITBarcelona

* A detailed agenda will be published soon

Call for speakers and content is OPEN ==> LINK to summit sessions

Twitter

Official twitter account will be : @sitbarcelona

The hashtag for this SAP Inside Track is #sitBCN

About complete agenda, sponsorship packages, accomodation and travel info, social event,etc.. take a look at SIT Barcelona site

https://sitbarcelona.com

Hope to meet all of you there!

David Ruiz Badia, Lluis Salvador Suarez , Enric Castella, Imma Salmeron, Losel Tenzin & Mario de Felipe.

entry.title: Re: SAP Community "watch-and-code" parties
entry.content:
Hi all

Just to share with all of you that we will organize our next SITBarcelona 2023 next November 2nd and 3rd, and this year also will host SAP Community watch-and-code party (Nov 3rd, morning)

So, you are all invited to check details here:

https://groups.community.sap.com/t5/barcelona-blog-posts/sap-inside-track-barcelona-2023-sap-communi...

And of course, we will be more than happy if you would like to join us as speakers or attendees!!

Best, David

entry.title: SAP Inside Track Barcelona 2023 Recap
entry.content:
First time, SAP Inside Track Barcelona hosted also SAP Community watch-and-code meetup in parallel to what was happening in Bangalore, at SAP TechEd 2023. 

SAP Community Barcelona enjoyed 2 days event and experienced the transformative power of knowledge sharing and networking.

We would like to start our recap with a sincere gratituted to all who contributed making it happen, our attendees, speakers, sponsors and volunteers. This year with 70+ attendees that made  SITBarcelona gathering incredible.

On Thursday Nov 2nd, an Opening Altogether Dinner kicked off at this year main sponsor offices, Syntax. Cool place to experience networking, meet old colleagues, making new connections and enjoying relaxed conversations when having awesome pizzas and drinks.

On Friday Nov 3rd morning SAP Community watch-and-code meetup took place in Endesa Offices, in Espai Endesa modernist room. This in-person community event was hosted concurrently with SAP TechEd,  providing an exceptional opportunity for SAP enthusiasts to come together, network, learn, and code! Participants were able to rewatch the SAP TechEd keynote together and take part in a Q&A session with experts coming from SAP Spain. After this first block, attendees participated in the hands-on mini code jam session focused on extending SAP S/4HANA via SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP). Here we would like to thank Enric Castella, Losel Tenzin , Xavier González and Sergio Martinez who volunteer as instructors helping to solve issues along the mini code jam session. Closing the morning block we made a raffle to win 4 e-books and 1-year free subscription thanks to Espresso Tutorials and SAP Press. Here we would like to thank so much our beloved SAP Champions and friend Nil Peksen who accepted to be on stage and run the draw. Congratulations to the winners:

  • Monica Corella
  • Kashish Arora
  • Gregory Doukas
  • Antonio Valladares
  • Ana Lopera

After recovering forces at lunch sponsored by SAP Community and AUSAPE, SITBarcelona sessions took place in two rooms:

Magdalena MurtraSAP independ Consultant Ecosystem. Get an overview of the SAP freelance consultant ecosystem
Antonio Ancos"Walldorf, tenemos un problema", hablando de la necesidad de formarse (cómo y dónde hacerlo) y de reaprender
Anxo CampoSAP & IA - Transforming Data Insights: The Synergy of self-hosted LLM's and SAP Hana
Cesar Martin & Luis AguadoABAP’s future in the Cloud
Alessandro SabidussiAI and ML scenario for SAP S/4HANA Cloud (public and private) - what's available and what's coming
Antonio ValladaresBest practices on Cloud Integration
Felipe Geva UrbanoShow de EHR from Hospital Clinic developed on ui5
Bernhard LueckeSAP4ME & Anything else you always wanted to ask about SAP Support 
Gregory DoukasStreamlining Complex Scenarios in SAP BTP
Fran VillegasInnovating with the AWS SDK for SAP ABAP
Luis Felipe Lanz & Diego PeregoSAP BTP Future Ready Enterprise, a solid framework for platform adoption
Felipe BorgesGlobal e-Invoicing and e-Reporting with SAP Document and Reporting Compliance

Remember that all content was recorded and now availabe here.  In a few weeks, also sessions slides will be available at SITBarcelona site.

As said before, big thanks to all our sponsors who year after year believe and support our SAP Community event:

 

Last but not least, we would to invite to all of you to join the SAP Community Barcelona Group, our group at SAP Community, it is our objective to make it our regular meeting point to share SAP related information Needless to say, the group is open to anyone! So, help us grow by sharing it with all your SAP contacts.

 

And final thanks to the amazing volunteers team who is behind SITBarcelona:

Lluis Salvador, Enric Castella, Losel Tenzin, Imma Salmerón, Mario de Felipe and me.

Behind the scenes, many thanks to Mireia Bubí, Laia Ruiz, Tamara Curiel!

And from SAP Community, big thanks to Laura Schmitz  and Svea Becker

 

See you next year!

entry.title: Re: AUSAPE FORUM 2024
entry.content:
Some KPIs from last AUSAPE Forum

  • 460 companies between partners and sap customers
  • 78 sponsors with 75 partners stands
  • 185 sessions offered to attendees
  • 1322 app downloads

Hope to see you next AUSAPE Forum 2025 !!!

entry.title: SAP Inside Track Barcelona 2024 - Nov 22, 2024
entry.content:
Hi Barcelona and SAP Community !!

We are very excited to announce to you that SAP Inside Track Barcelona 8th edition will take place next November 22nd 2024.

A SAP Inside Track (SIT) is a local grassroots community organised event where SAP Community Network members come together to share knowledge and expertise and to network about SAP related topics. SAP Inside Tracks have been very successful in countries all over the World.

Come to learn and share your knowledge with your peers as well as make new friends in an informal atmosphere.

SAP Inside Track events offer SAP Community provided sessions from SAP Experts and passionate SAP Community members.

We invite you to participate and help us to do a great event.  Don’t forget to invite your colleagues.

Where 

Modernist Room (Carrer de Roger de Flor 48, 08018 Barcelona) ➡️ https://goo.gl/maps/Kp25w8mZgLo

Who

For local and global SAP community (customers, consultants, freelancers, startups, press and bloggers, SAP employees) plus for those totally new to SAP. The most important is that you want to share and gain some knowledge and new buddies.

Registration

WIP. Stay tuned for updates.

Sessions and Agenda 

This year 2024, agenda (*) will have next schema

  • Opening SITBarcelona
  • SITBarcelona sessions (Block 1)
  • Break/beverages & snacks
  • Mini Code JAM: TBC
  • Lunch
  • SITBarcelona sessions (Block 2)
  • Closing SITBarcelona

* A detailed agenda will be published around October.

(NEW) Call for speakers and content is OPEN ➡️ LINK to summit sessions

(NEW) You will find SITBarcelona event here :

https://community.sap.com/t5/sap-inside-track/sap-inside-track-barcelona-nov-22th-2024/ev-p/13756577

 

Twitter ➡️ Official twitter account will be : @sitbarcelona

Hashtags for SAP Inside Track Barcelona are  #SITBarcelona and #SITBCN

 

About complete agenda, sponsorship packages, accomodation and travel info, social event,etc.. please contact us or take a look at SIT Barcelona site https://sitbarcelona.com

 

Hope to meet all of you there!

David Ruiz Badia, Lluis Salvador Suarez  , Enric Castella Imma Salmeron, Mireia Bubí & Losel Tenzin

entry.title: SAP Inside Track Barcelona 2024 Recap
entry.content:
We would like to start our recap with a sincere gratituted to all who contributed making it happen, our attendees, speakers, sponsors and volunteers. This year 2024 with 80+ attendees that made SITBarcelona gathering incredible.

On Thursday evening, staff, friends and speakers of SITBarcelona enjoyed an alltogether informal dinner in a relaxed and friendly atmosphere before the event.

     

This eighth edition of SAP Inside Track Barcelona featured a diverse and engaging program. It included presentations by SAP experts and members of the SAP Community Network, touching on a variety of cutting-edge topics.

Antonio AncosSAP 2024 de la A a la Z
Antonio LeiteKnowledge Graphs with SAP Data
Josetxu FernandezGenAI in SAP Data and Analytics
Fran Villegas

Get Business insights from your SAP data with Natural Language and Develop Gen AI solutions integrating AWS and SAP BTP Services

Alejandro RodriguezSAP BTP Chef: first SAP demo where all the pillars of BTP are shown in a practical business case.
Felipe BorgesGlobal eCompliance with SAP Document and Reporting Compliance
Gregory DoukasTechnician Training Tool powered by Apple Vision Pro and SAP S/4HANA
Maria Codinach and Harsh KumarFrit Ravich's success case in the modernization of sales application: from SMP to in-house middleware
Niranjan GattupalliImplementing gCTS for Continous Delivery in complex S/4HANA landscapes: Branching Models, Hotfix strategies and 5-Tier Architecture
Antonio ValladaresIntegration Suite addon build in SAP CAP by Code10
Bernhard LueckeReinventing Support with AI

Between the sessions at the breaks, were made several raffle to win 2 e-books and 1month free subscription to all attendees thanks to Espresso Tutorials, 2 e-books thanks to SAP PRESS and 5 100€ Gift Cards from SAP Store thanks to CUVIV. Here we would like to thank so much our beloved SAP Champions and friend Nil Peksen who accepted to be on stage and run some of the draws.

In addition to the insightful presentations, the event also featured a hands-on session led by Antonio Maradiaga, a member of the SAP Developer Advocates. This practical session focused on SAP Build Code and demonstrated how to develop applications using Generative AI and SAP's Joule Assistant.

As every past event, remember that all content was recorded and now availabe here. And also all official photos will be published in this album for you.

We would like to specially thank you to SAP people from Spain like  Luis Felipe Lanz, Bernhard Luecke, Jorge Perez, Cesar Martin, Antonio Maradiaga, Rafael Valdes and Carles Viaplana for their continous engament with our local SAP Community and supporting the event to take it to the next level.

As said before, big thanks to all our sponsors who year after year believe and support our SAP Community event:

The event concluded with a great sense of excitement, leaving everyone eagerly anticipating next year’s edition. A heartfelt thanks to all attendees, speakers, sponsors, and volunteers who made it all possible.

SAP Inside Track Barcelona continues to prove itself as one of the most influential events in the SAP community, offering a platform for knowledge sharing, networking, and exploring the latest innovations in the SAP ecosystem.

So, looking forward to meet all of you in SAP Inside Track Barcelona 2025!!

Mireia Bubi, Lluis Salvador, Enric Castella, Losel Tenzin, Imma Salmeron, David Ruiz

entry.title: SAP Inside Track Barcelona 2025 - Nov 14th
entry.content:
Hi Barcelona and SAP Community !!

We are very excited to announce to you that SAP Inside Track Barcelona 9th edition will take place next November 14th 2025

A SAP Inside Track (SIT) is a local grassroots community organised event where SAP Community Network members come together to share knowledge and expertise and to network about SAP related topics. SAP Inside Tracks have been very successful in countries all over the World.

Come to learn and share your knowledge with your peers as well as make new friends in an informal atmosphere.

SAP Inside Track events offer SAP Community provided sessions from SAP Experts and passionate SAP Community members.

We invite you to participate and help us to do a great event.  Don’t forget to invite your colleagues.

Where : Modernist Room (Carrer de Roger de Flor 48, 08018 Barcelona)  https://goo.gl/maps/Kp25w8mZgLo

Who : For local and global SAP community (customers, consultants, freelancers, startups, press and bloggers, SAP employees) plus for those totally new to SAP.  The most important is that you want to share and gain some knowledge and new buddies.

Registration : WIP. Stay tuned for updates.

Sessions and Agenda :  This year 2025, agenda (*) will have next schema

  • Opening SITBarcelona
  • SITBarcelona sessions (Block 1)
  • Break/beverages & snacks
  • AUSIA-AUSAPE : SAP BTP Hackathon Final
  • Lunch
  • SITBarcelona sessions (Block 2)
  • Closing SITBarcelona

* A detailed agenda will be published around midOctober.

(NEW) Call for speakers and content is OPEN  :   LINK to summit your proposals

(NEW) You will find SITBarcelona event here :

https://community.sap.com/t5/barcelona-events/sap-insisde-track-barcelona-2025/ec-p/14145343#M8

Blusky : Official account will be @sitbarcelona.bsky.social‬

Twitter : Official account will be @sitbarcelona

Hashtags for SAP Inside Track Barcelona are  #SITBarcelona and #SITBCN

About complete agenda, sponsorship packages, accomodation and travel info, social event,etc.. please contact us or take a look at SIT Barcelona site https://sitbarcelona.com

Hope to meet all of you there!

Lluis Salvador Suarez, Enric Castella , Imma Salmeron,  Mireia Bubí ,

Losel Tenzin ,  Saul Quintero,and David Ruiz Badia
